about_the_game:
Grab your uniform and put your customer service face on! Get ready to tackle the fast-paced environment of your shifts in Retale, where managing your time and resources is key to avoid getting fir- sorry, to avoid "leaving to pursue other opportunities".



Your job is simple: stock the shelves and keep the customers happy. Simple doesn't always mean easy, though; be prepared to face an array of obstacles as you work your way ever closer to being able to finally clock out for the day. Armed with your trusty airhorn, step up to the challenge and practice your work down to a science. Navigate the sales floor, find secrets, and aim to become Employee of the Month!



Acquaint yourself with the mostly-tolerable store regulars, and make sure they experience the customer satisfaction guarantee. Quell their complaints quickly before they go full Karen on you, or just throw a well-aimed box at them. It's only assault if someone catches you, right? You'll have the "dedicated support" (reluctant cooperation) of your "loyal team" (assigned shift members) to help you, but don't let anyone sleep on the job!



If you're feeling confident, head on down to Tech and you'll find someone who may be willing to make you some useful items. Customize your build with special abilities to enhance your performance, from super-speed shoes to a high-tech hypnotizer. Combine up to three items together to find new strategies and make each shift unique.



Whether you prefer to take it one step at a time or find the most optimal playstyle for each situation, so long as Terry is satisfied you'll have succeeded! Just make sure not to get on his bad side... there are few things scarier than an angry manager.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics or AMD Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce 9600 GT or AMD Radeon HD 2400
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Experience working in retail with hardly any similarities to actually working in retail! Manage your time wisely to keep the shelves stocked, control the complaints of colorful and cranky customers, and be wary of the watchful eye of your manager to avoid being fired... or worse.
